DOC.brief_summary: This is a Randomized double blind trial with the aim to estimate the effectiveness of 3 therapeutic regimes per os on migraine pain: - metoclopramide 0,15 mg/kg + placebo - metoclopramide 0,15 mg/Kg + ketoprofen 1 mg/kg - ketoprofen 1 mg/Kg + placebo Intensity of pain will be measured with linear 1-10 scale or analogic McGrath type scale every 20 min. The main objective is the evaluation of healing times from pain in the 3 groups
DOC.brief_title: Trial on Metoclopramide and Ketoprofen in Acute Migraine of Childhood
DOC.criteria: Children 617 years old with migraine presenting in emergency room Informed consensus not obtained Occurring migraine still treated Hemiplegic migraine
